DOC.brief_summary: The aim study detect association maternal serum antioxidant level preterm labor .
DOC.brief_title: Role Serum Total Antioxidant Level Preterm Labor
DOC.detailed_description: Study design : This prospective case-control study . Setting : The study conduct Ain Shams University Maternity Hospital . Population study : A total 70 pregnant woman attend outpatient obstetric clinic inpatient Obstetrics Gynecology department admit delivary room Ain Shams university hospital . Patient divide two group . Group A : 35 pregnant woman diagnose preterm labor ( Preterm labor pain least 3 contraction every 20 minute , cervical dilatation < 2cm effacement < 50 % ) deliver within one week maximum hospitalization . Group B : 35 pregnant woman ( control ) uncomplicated pregnancy similar gestational age follow routinely antenatal care unit . Every case subject : - 1 . Written inform consent study . 2 . Complete history . 3 . Complete general abdominal examination . 4 . Infection marker ( CRP , WBCs count , urine analysis ) . 5 . Gestational age determination last menstrual date Ultrasonography . 6 . Local pelvic examination .
DOC.criteria: Preterm labor ( pregnant 28th 37th week ) . Singleton pregnancy . Amnion membrane intact Past history preterm labor premature delivery . Urinary tract infection infection . Poly oligohydramnios . Fetal distress , fetal uterine anomaly . Membranes rupture placenta pathology . Preeclampsia intrauterine growth retardation
